values.alarm_description: This metric checks if the CPU utilization is <= 30% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.
This metric checks if the CPU utilization is >= 50% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.

before.alarm_description: This metric checks if the CPU utilization is <= 30% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.

after.alarm_description: This metric checks if the CPU utilization is <= 30% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.

before.alarm_description: This metric checks if the CPU utilization is >= 50% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.

after.alarm_description: This metric checks if the CPU utilization is >= 50% for 2 consecutive periods of 60 seconds.

asg_name.description: Name of the Auto Scaling Group

desired_capacity.description: Desired number of instances in the ASG

instance_sg.description: VPC Security Group ID for the instances

key_name.description: SSH key name to use for the instances

max_size.description: Maximum number of instances in the ASG

min_size.description: Minimum number of instances in the ASG

on_demand_base_capacity.description: The number of on-demand instances to start.

on_demand_percentage_above_base_capacity.description: The percentage of additional on-demand instances to start, above the on_demand_base_capacity value.
